subject: Remove Product Review
description_text:
I would like my product review for your Plus X pedals removed.  I was offered a discount if I added a picture to the review and never received the discount. This is now the second time your company has not followed through on an offer with me. I won’t continue positively advertising your products, while you keep scamming me. 

Daniel Wells
